body_html:
Hi,
Thanks for the PR!
I think the previous version was ok, because it meant to use the functional interface torch.nn.functional instead of the module interface.
But maybe we can make the previous documentation more clear on that aspect?

Hi,

body:
Hi,
Thanks for the PR!
I think the previous version was ok, because it meant to use the functional interface `torch.nn.functional` instead of the module interface.
But maybe we can make the previous documentation more clear on that aspect?
